attributes.action: Stop the mass influx of fake news.
attributes.background: Over the last 2 years, the number of fake news articles have risen enormously, the fact is, who can make sensible political decisions, when they can not tell true from false. This petition world place a ban on fake news stories influencing political decisions.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
